title: I wanted
content:
I wanted to know what companies use a DIN type and CORPID type like corporate font   
   
tanks
author: trama

comments.content: adidas use ff din for all of their ad's.

There is a lot of companies using Din Mittleschrift, FF Din and   
mods of these .
